content.rendered:
Providing Energy-Efficient
Heating and Cooling Systems

Local HVAC Expertsthroughout the Greater Toronto Area.

(416) 414-3249

100% Satisfaction Guaranteed

416 Heating and Cooling has you covered whether you need an AC or heating repair, a new installation, or routine maintenance.

We’re your one-stop shop for all your home’s HVAC needs!

Our company provides heating repair, AC repair, boiler replacement, furnace installation, AC installation, water heater installation, and maintenance services to Toronto, Mississauga, Brampton, Markham, ON and surrounding areas.

SERVICES WE OFFER

We provide furnace services for residential and commercial properties across all Toronto

  • Repair old or malfunctioning systems
  • Replace out of date equipment with new high quality furnaces
  • Install central air systems
  • Repair or replace existing ductless heated coils.

We are focused on providing you a complete HVAC system installation from attic down to foundation.

Why Choose Us

We are a family-owned and operated company that offers 100% satisfaction guaranteed. Our heating and air conditioning repair services are second-to-none. We install furnaces, water heaters, AC units, and air conditioners or just provide regular maintenance.

CALL US TODAY

(416) 414-3249

OR

GET IN TOUCH WITH US

Fill out the form and we will contact you to book your first appointment.

    Your Name

    Your Phone Number

    Your Email Address

    Your Message

    Central HVAC Care and Repair

    We provide heating repair services including boiler replacement, furnace installation, air conditioner installation and maintenance services.

    • Install new systems
    • Repair faulty equipment
    • Replace parts

    Indoor Air Quality Solutions

    If you’re experiencing these symptoms then there’s a good chance your indoor air quality could be improved.

    • Headaches
    • Fatigue
    • Congestion
    • Skin irritation

    We install heating and cooling systems, water heaters, air purifiers, humidifiers etc. to:

    • Help You Breathe Easy
    • Keep Your Home Cool & Warm During The Summer And Winter Months
    • Make Sure Your Family Is Safe From Allergens And Other Health Threats

    Gas Tankless Water heater

    Water heating accounts for the second-largest energy use in your home, so it’s worth the upgrade. a Tankless water heater can provide endless hot water for your family and takes up little space.

    • Never Run Out of Hot Water & Lower your energy bills.
    • Better Value Than a Tank & Save Valuable Space
    • Highest Water Output Options & Advanced Features and Design

    Ductless System Options

    We install Mitsubishi Ductless Air Conditioning systems which are incredibly energy efficient. A ductless mini-split air conditioner system can provide better comfort and lower energy bills than traditional central air conditioning systems.

    • Flexible installation options
    • Less expensive than traditional systems
    • Smaller size means less noise

    Smart Thermostats and Home Automation

    There is no better method to save electricity than the Nest Smart Thermostat. Heating and cooling systems are monitored, and an alert is sent if something doesn’t appear to be working properly. Maintenance is made even easier with the Nest Smart Thermostat’s handy reminders. Our Nest Entry Level Install Special is available right now!

    Humidifiers & Dehumidifiers

    If you are looking at a whole-house humidifier, 416Heating can help. Whole-home humidifier systems are designed to bring comfort by delivering a balanced amount of moisture into your home. They are installed directly into your home’s central heating and cooling system, and maintenance is low.

    • Increase Personal Comfort
    • Preserve Your Home
    • High Reward Performance

    We Proudley Serve the Following Areas

    • Greater Toronto Area (GTA)
    • North York
    • Markham
    • Vaughan
    • Oshawa
    • Kleinburg
    • Caledon
    • Brampton
    • Mississauga
    • Pickering
    • Milton
    • Whitby
